summary: A depressed housewife whose husband is having an affair contemplates suicide, but changes her mind when she faces death by a killer hired to do her in.
cast: Cher|Chazz Palminteri|Ryan O'Neal|Paul Mazursky|Amber Smith|Elisa Leonetti|Mark Nassar|Stephen Spinella|Jeffrey Wright|David Marino|Steven Randazzo|Olinda Turturro|Max Norat|Allison Janney|Chris O'Neill|Michael Mulheren|Jerry Walsh|Gianna Palminteri|Omar Scroggins|Zakee Howze|Paul Ronan|Steve Carrieri|George Gerard|Patrick Smith
title: Fielmente tuya
